Text: Meeting questiona recent visit to the EBS Information Security team it was realized that during the EBS redeployment about of their teams resources were cut and now with the recent attacksbreakins on Enron resources Routers servers clients are there any plans to bring that team back up to full staffing Its my understanding that this team had identified various risks and vulnerabilities in the past however without the proper manpower how is EBS going to ensure security is not overlooked and these breakins do not continue Do You Yahoo Yahoo Auctions buy the things you want at great prices
